languages.text: "Мятежники вроде него появляются с завидной регулярностью. Если не Немезит, то будет кто-то другой. Они... как плесень".
"Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."
languages.original_text: "Мятежники вроде него появляются с завидной регулярностью. Если не Немезит, то будет кто-то другой. Они... как плесень".

traits.locale_text: "Rebels like him appear regularly. If it won't be a Nemesite, it will be someone else. They are like mould."
"Rebels like him appear regularly. If it won't be a Nemesite, it will be someone else. They are like mould."
"Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."
"Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."
"Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."
"Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."
"Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."

languages.text: "Rebellen wie er tauchen regelmäßig auf. Wenn es kein Nemesit ist, dann ist es jemand anders. Diese Leute sind wie Schimmel."
languages.original_text: "Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."

traits.locale_text: "Rebellen wie er tauchen regelmäßig auf. Wenn es kein Nemesit ist, dann ist es jemand anders. Diese Leute sind wie Schimmel."

languages.text: « Les rebelles ont une fâcheuse tendance à refaire surface régulièrement. Si le prochain ne se fait pas appeler Némésite, ce sera autre chose. Ces misérables se reproduisent comme des champignons. »
languages.original_text: "Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."

traits.locale_text: « Les rebelles ont une fâcheuse tendance à refaire surface régulièrement. Si le prochain ne se fait pas appeler Némésite, ce sera autre chose. Ces misérables se reproduisent comme des champignons. »

languages.text: «Los rebeldes como este aparecen con demasiada regularidad. Si no se llama Nemesitio, tendrá otro nombre. Son como el moho».
languages.original_text: "Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."

traits.locale_text: «Los rebeldes como este aparecen con demasiada regularidad. Si no se llama Nemesitio, tendrá otro nombre. Son como el moho».

languages.text: 「彼のような反逆者は、定期的に現れる。ネメサイトでないなら、他の誰かだ。彼らはカビのような連中だ」
languages.original_text: "Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."

traits.locale_text: 「彼のような反逆者は、定期的に現れる。ネメサイトでないなら、他の誰かだ。彼らはカビのような連中だ」

languages.text: “像这样的叛乱分子始终都会出现，就算不是涅墨斯特，也会是别的什么人。这些人就像霉菌一样没完没了。”
languages.original_text: "Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."

traits.locale_text: “像这样的叛乱分子始终都会出现，就算不是涅墨斯特，也会是别的什么人。这些人就像霉菌一样没完没了。”

languages.original_text: "Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."

languages.text: "Onun gibi isyancılar çok sık ortaya çıkar. Nemezit olmasa başka biri olur. Bu insanlar aynı kalıptan çıkmış gibiler."
languages.original_text: "Rebels like him appear all too regularly. If it's not a Nemesite, it'll be someone else. They're like mould, these people."
